author: Danny Hacker *Signed Up For This*
text: It’s one of those records when I get into a mental rut or upset and need something with some kick, I play it immediately because it always helps me get back to my good frame of mind. I’m very thankful it exists. It’s a fantastic listen no matter what

author: Danny Hacker *Signed Up For This*
text: I got to see 90% of the album performed live in March and it was honestly a really indescribable experience. This is a clip of “Serotonin” from that night. The energy was insane and seeing it live makes every listen to the album that much more impactful https://t.co/mHDEYiQD5I

author: Danny Hacker *Signed Up For This*
text: First time hearing it, I was blown away not only by how addicting it sounds but how deep, brutal and honest the lyrics are. Depression, anxiety, frustration, aggravation, anger and so much more is woven within these songs. Marie has a way with words and making it hit hard

author: Danny Hacker *Signed Up For This*
text: I know it’s late but I just saw today is the 1 year anniversary of ‘if i can make it go quiet’ by @_girlinred_ and it’s a really important record to me so I wanted to give it its due. It’s one of two of my “mental health” records and it really helped me through & learn a lot https://t.co/rfUy7sYBTh

author: Danny Hacker *Signed Up For This*
text:
Dane Dunning has tied his longest outing of his career with 7.0 IP vs the Braves tonight (threw 7.0 on 9/15/20 vs the Twins as a member of the White Sox)

7.0, 1ER, 1R, 2H, 7K, 0BB on 83 pitches tonight so far. 37% CSW%. Incredibly efficient https://t.co/YBfXsaz0PH

author: Danny Hacker *Signed Up For This*
text:
Dane Dunning is rolling right along vs the Braves tonight. Struck out 5 of the first 6 and then has adjusted along the way. Through 5 innings so far on 63 pitches 

After 3 iffy starts to start the season, Dunning seems to be finding his groove. 11 K, 1 BB in his last 2 starts https://t.co/uaEwLme1Sm

author: Danny Hacker *Signed Up For This*
text:
If that’s the end of the pitching duel, what an absolutely fantastic one it was. What an absolutely amazing and super entertaining game

Kelly: 7.0, 0ER, 0R, 2H, 4K, 0BB on 97

Mikolas: 7.1, 2ER, 2R, 4H, 7K, 0BB on 98 

2 HRs in the 8th are the difference in the game & lines

author: Danny Hacker *Signed Up For This*
text: This Cardinals-D’backs game has easily been one of, if not, the best game I’ve listened to/watched all season so far. What a game

author: Danny Hacker *Signed Up For This*
text: Merrill Kelly and Miles Mikolas are dueling in such a fantastic fashion. Two kitchen sink pitchers being masterful and really hitting their locations with the variety they’re throwing. I absolutely love it! Top of the 6th, 0-0 only 2 combined hits allowed https://t.co/LcXtH1zdRi

author: Danny Hacker *Signed Up For This*
text:
There’s a really underrated pitching matchup today between Miles Mikolas and Merrill Kelly (Both went overseas to better themselves and got second chances as a result) and MLB Network decides to rerun Bull Durham for the 8 millionth time? 

Feels like a big swing and miss
